turns.content: Are you aware of the story of the “Joy Luck Club”?

Yes, I am aware of the story of "The Joy Luck Club." It is a novel written by Amy Tan, first published in 1989. The novel is about the relationships between four Chinese American mothers and their four American-born daughters. The mothers, who are all immigrants from China, formed a club called the Joy Luck Club in China to play mahjong and share their experiences, joys and sorrows. The novel explores themes of cultural identity, intergenerational relationships, and the American Dream.
